title: Police Investigating Death At Barrington Home
content:
CHICAGO (CBS) — Police were investigating a death at a home in northwest suburban Barrington, after a discovery there Tuesday afternoon. 
 
Barrington police and firefighters responded to a home in the 500 block of North Avenue around 4:15 p.m. Tuesday, after receiving calls about a possible death. 
 
Police have not released any details about the case, including any information about the victim or victims. Published reports indicate a couple and their adult daughter, who might have special needs, have lived there several years. 
 
The Cook County Major Case Assistance Team is helping Barrington police with the death investigation.
